Text: Re smubetas ers its time to hump itWhere the Hell were you guys last weekend Of course I saw only of my pledge brothers Class of But I saw a bunch of the brothers from the class of whose th Reunion it was mine was years ago I was hoping to meet some of you jackoff idiots who I didnt know I thought Chuck Paul was going to be there but if he was I didnt get to renew kai Brother Dent as another Brother Dent you may not remember but we finally met a few years ago at the Student Center when you were having a book signing before the Baylor game and I got you to sign a copy of The Junction Boys for my stepson Jim Bavouset who was an Aggie Beta We had a nice long chat remembering some of the times from back in the s when you were the Sports Editor for the Daily Campus and I was working my ass off over in the corner of the campus in law school You gave me a business card and Ive been remiss in not contacting you since that serindipitous occasion when I finallly met you I hope that youll acept this my apology for not contacting you before now Ive actually thought about it several times before now So after reading all of these posts from all of you guys from classes just after mine and it hurts me that more of my own classmates and guys before me havent found it appropriate to write on this Board Im quite impressed to see how close all of you guys have remained after all of these years just like I was to see all of my good friends and Brothers from the class of this past weekend I saw a few guys I havent seen in over years and we picked up as if there hadnt been any time that elapsed between Damn its great to be a BETA The Deacon kai Original Message From Felix Zaremba Co Inc To Sent Wednesday October AM Subject Re smubetas ers its time to hump it George Steinwart Son of a bitch So you must have had like a or something cause I KNOW I must have had a yeah thats it a I remember telling my Freshman math professor in all seriousness that the reason I was failing was because I was pledging a fraternity and didnt he understandit was the MOST important part of the college experience after all What have you been up to for the last years ZEBA Who was and Original Message From To Sent Wednesday October AM Subject Re smubetas ers its time to hump it ALAN YOU WERENT LAST IN OUR CLASS I WAS AT I CHOOSE TO FORGET WHAT GRADE POINT IT TOOK TO ATTAIN THAT DISTINCTION AT LEAST I PASSED ENOUGH COURSES TO GET INITIATED GEORGE STEINWART At Homecoming the BETA TENT had the biggest crowd by far Stay connected and consider a future homecoming BETA reunion Its incredibleforget the years in betweeneveryone just seems to pick it up right where they left off years ago Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms At Homecoming the BETA TENT had the biggest Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn BetasCarl I another cardcarryin Republican who once played the part of Sir H Rape Brown de Black Knight in Cumalot also have apparently changed my ways of thinking over the years And in these times of PC one cannot afford not to or at least to project a believable image that heshe is a convert And right now the National Fraternity is under this same microscope and acted though somewhat precipitously with the bigger picture in mind Thats why I made the suggestions which I did And I hope that none of them though different than yours offended you I was merely trying to throw in the benefitignorance of my own experiences in such matters And today while thinking further own the subject I thought that as part of the game plan I suggested last night the chapter might consider involving some of its more influential and credible alums and identify the same type of alums from the Black fraternity Then when meeting with the allimportant intermediary a suggested meeting between the alums from the two frats and the intermediary be made I cant decide whether I would want to suggest including student representatives from the two frats at this first meeting I seem to come down on the play of having a second meeting with the alums from both frats with the intermediary and include selected student representatives nonhotheads from our side to attend and take an active role in the negotiations From there if all goes well a BIG if the same groups can then have a big meeting with all members and pledges from both frats maybe dangerous or have separate meetings with each frat less volatile where the enemy representatives attend along with the intermediary kai Dick Dent Original Message From CARL HOHL To Sent Thursday November AM Subject Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn Betas alDentiii JaDrow I applaud your additions and input Hes right Woody And he doesnt need me to say that either but I wish I had thought of what he added first The BF Black Fraternity what are the Greek letters holds most of the cards in this scenario Therefore whoever the intermediary is is excruciatingly important visavis credibility with local Auburn parties as well as the National fraternities Bottom line Can everybody including the polkadotted people step outside of their stereotypical roles for a minute and make a statement to their unborn sons and daughters that racism of all colors ends with our generation Shocking coming from a Republican Or is this just another news story another missed opportunity After all we went to SMU for the same reason they are at Auburn now Most of us are or will be amused to look back at some of the unexpected sources of the lessons learned Can you tell that my profession is very close to this question more often than all of its members wish to admit The Less Diplomatic Brother Sarl Wed Nov aldentiii wrote Woody though Brother Carls suggestions have some merit I suggest that if you are going to get involved and talk to your sons actives that a little more diplomacy be considered I too have read many of the news reports about the incident and several were coupled with quotes from members of the Black fraternity aimed directly at the Betas rather than the Delta Sigs I think that any attempt on the part of the local former chapter members to approach the members of the Black fraternity for forgiveness will be met with outrage and will be rejected and blown up in the press in such a way as to make impossible a solution The chapter needs to find an intermediary who they can talk to and who has credibility with the Black fraternity They need to have a complete game plan to pitch to the intermediary who if convinced with their sincerity about their remorse in what happened will be willing to pitch their case to the Black fraternity in hopes of bringing about a meeting between representatives from the Beta chapter and the Black fraternity to iron out an agreement to resolve the dispute and to include the Black fraternity in supporting a petition to reinstate the chapters charter and probably with conditions which the Black fraternity will demand and which the Betas behind the eight ball cant negotiate away Unfortunately the Betas are not in a good bargaining position So whatever course they elect to take they will need to remember this They will have to eat a whole lot of humblepie to get that charter back kai Dick Dent aka the Deacon Original Message From woody berry To Sent Wednesday November PM Subject Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn Betas Carl Thats a great idea and is one the men there are already trying to work on As you might imagine relations with the black frat are a bit raw emotionally right now but its a good idea Thanks Drow PS By the way thats quite possibly the very first intelligent thing Ive ever hear you articulate in oh about years or so Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp At Homecoming the BETA TENT had the biggest crowd by far Stay connected and consider a future homecoming BETA reunion Its incredibleforget the years in betweeneveryone just seems to pick it up right where they left off years ago Your use of Yahoo Groups Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn BetasBrother Shackleton its your kind of thinking that lead to this discussion You know damn well the THE REASON that the Black fraternity with no white members exists on the Auburn campus is because there are none of the Miami Triad members or any other national fraternities on that campus who pledge Blacks So dont be so stupid with your inane comment about the fact that the Black fraternity has no white guys as members Before you stepped foot on the campus at SMU there was an occasion when there was a very sharp Black guy who registered for and came through rush Surprisingly there were several of us including yours truly an original New Orleans biggot of the highest magnitude who really were impressed with the guy and thought we should invite him back for the house party I remember vividly the incredible outlash when we stood before our brothers and tried to convince them to ignore the fact that this guy was Black We got hooted down and he was BALLED And I have no doubts after reading your immature remark that the same would have taken place during your tenure as an active at Gamma Omega So get a life Ace Its and counting How many Black brothers can you name from Gamma Omega kai Dick Dent Original Message From To Sent Thursday November PM Subject Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn Betas RE the important intermediary that will break the stranglehold on racism here The Betas might get one of white guys in the Black Frat to step in to help CARL HOHL on AM Please respond to To cc Subject Re smubetas Sad day for Auburn Betas alDentiii JaDrow I applaud your additions and input Hes right Woody And he doesnt need me to say that either but I wish I had thought of what he added first The BF Black Fraternity what are the Greek letters holds most of the cards in this scenario Therefore whoever the intermediary is is excruciatingly important visavis credibility with local Auburn parties as well as the National fraternities Bottom our generation Shocking coming from a Republican Or is this just another news story another missed opportunity After all we went to SMU for the same reason they are at Auburn now Most of us are or will be amused to look back at some of the unexpected sources of the lessons learned Can you tell that my profession is very close to this question more often than all of its members wish to admit The need to have a complete game plan to pitch to the intermediary who if convinced with their sincerity about their remorse in what happened will be willing to pitch their case to the Black fraternity in hopes of bringing about a meeting between representatives from the Beta chapter and the Black fraternity to iron out an agreement to resolve the dispute and to include the Black fraternity in supporting a petition to reinstate the chapters charter and probably with conditions which the Black fraternity will demand and which the Betas behind the eight ball cant negotiate away Unfortunately the Betas are not in a good bargaining position So whatever course they elect to take they will need to remember this They will have to eat a whole lot of humblepie to get that charter back kai Dick Re smubetas new membersHey Chuck you Ol Fart After we all meld together and age equally ie were all Ol Farts Anyway its great to hear from you and yes I remember you too Tell Grumbles I said Hi and to send me an email and tell me what hes up to The last time I saw him was at the House during Homecoming about six or seven years ago I remember seeing Grumbles Foladori Tom Duran from the great old town of Goldthwaite Texas Bruce Sparling and a hell of a lot of the ol gang except most of the guys from my class and before Foladori just recently joined my law firm as a Partner and he has said that he plans to be at Homecoming along with a lot of the guys from his class since this is their th reunion I had mine two years ago Ive got my FB season tickets my SW Airtlines reservations and and a hotel room and my wife Phyllis and I will be there too I hope that you Grumbles and a whole slew of the guys I remember will be there as well I f only the guys from my own class and before would get interested and start participating itd be great Ive been going to home and away FB games for years and I never see any of the Brothers who were there when I was younger Maybe we can use this site with the help of our young Alumni Director Andrew McCarty to shame some of the old bastards to show their faces I will say that Carl McCaffrey and Fred Dotts do come to the games but theyre about the only ones I ever see Sadly that holds true for most of my friends from my class years whether they were Betas or not This needs to be fixed kai Dick Dent PS Beek I look forward to both seeing and meeting you and some of the other guys from your classes at Homecoming Original Message From Chuck Paul To Sent Wednesday October AM Subject RE smubetas new members Dick Dent as a member of the class of I certainly remember you as an upperclassman and glad to hear from a Beta who is older than I am John Miller and I got together w Bill Grumbles a couple weeks ago here in Atlanta All of us have been very active as SMU alums I was on the Alumni Board of Dir until last year and now John Miller is on board Bill Grumbles is the Pres Elect for next years board All of us will be there for this year Homecoming There will be presentation during Homecoming I think half time at the game of a bust which was done in honor of Payne Stewart and I believe that Bill G commissioned the bust This might be a great year to get ALL the Dallas Homecoming bound Betas together at the Beta tent before and after the game on October th kai Chuck Chuck Paul A Closer Look Professional Mystery Shopping Company Email Chuck CloserLookcom Original Message From aldentiii mailto Sent Tuesday October PM To Subject Re smubetas new members WELL I HOPE NOT TO BORE YOU GOOD BETA BROTHERS BUT I RECENTLY SUBSCRIBED TO THIS WEBSITE JUST BECAUSE IT INTRIGUIED ME AND ALSO BROUGHT BACK MANY MEMORIES FRO ME AS WELL I UNDERSTAND THAT FOR THE MOST PART YALL ARE BROTHERS FRO THE CLASSE OF OF WELL IM FROM THE CLASS OF THE WHICHEVER ONE OF YOU GUYS WAS SO OBSESSED WITH WHO WAS CAN FORGET ABOUT THAT IM AND AS FAR AS I CAN TELL IM STILL ALIVE IN FACT EVEN THOUGH I VE LIVED IN HOUSTON SINCE WHEN I GOT OUT OF LAW SCOOL AT SMU I VE HAD SEASON TICKETS FOR THE PONY FOOTBALL GAMES TO THIS DATE THEREVE BEEN SOME GOOD TIME TIMES AND SOME BAD TIMES BUT I STILL LOVE MY MUSTANGS IN FB AND IN BB NO MATTER WHAT AS FAR AS THE REFERENCE TO COMEALOT IS CONCERNED I HAVE TO INFORM YOU GUYS THAT IT WAS WRITTEN BY OF OUR BROTYHERS IN TEE WATKINS AND BILL DARROUGH WITH A LOT OF HELP FROM RANDY HENRY WE WON MANADA WITH COMEALOT IN AND BUT BEFORE THAT THE SAME GREAT WRITERS PUT TOGETHER MOPY DICK WITH WHICH WE ALSO WON MANADA FOR TWO YEARS IN A ROW YOU GUYS ACTUALLY MISSED THE BEST THAT GAMMA OMEGA EVER PRODUCED MOPY DICK SOLD OUT WHILE THER WERE NO LINES IN FRONT OF THE SAE PHI DELT OR FIGI TENTS EVERYBODY ON CAMPUS WAS IN LINE FOR TICKETS TO MOPY DICK AND AS AN ASIDE WE ALSO WON THE OLYMPICS THAT AFTERNOON IN OTHER WORDS WE KICKED ASS FOR ABOUT FOUR YEARS IN MANADA I GUESS IVE DRONED ON TOO LONG ABOUT THINGS WHICH OCCURED BEFORE YOU GUYS BECAME BETAS BUT THIS BOARD MIGHT BE A MEANS BY WHICH MY OLD CRONIES CAN GET INVOLVED TOO IM INCRDIBLY IMPRESSED WITH HOW YOU HUYS HAVE STAYED IN TOUCH AND HAVE KEPT KAI GOING AMONG YOU I ONLY WISH THAT IT COULD BE REVIVED WITH MY BROTHERS AS WELL REGARDS DICK DENT kai Original Message From CARL HOHL To Sent Monday October AM Subject Re smubetas new members Tubes Tubes Tubes What are we to do without our Director for the epic Comealot To see your missive well what can I say it bears me back to days of can you help me with the rest Wonderful hearing from you Hands Hohl KAI Carl Hohl Tomball native Active father of boys Travis Tyler and Trent Wife is Paula Commercial Real Estate Typhoon Both Carl and Paula are in relentless pursuit of excellence in solutions to Real Estate sales and acquisition problems CENTURY Executive Visit http omelogcom wwwcarlhohlcom Direct Line Email On Sat Oct pwm wrote Brothers of Gamma Omega My silence is broken I laughed my tired old ass off this morning reading the emails you guys wrote in response to our newest member Justin Loweth class of I know Im getting old when I have a daughter who also graduated from college with the class of And she is my second college graduate in the family I read with interest the observation from Beek that our Wooglin Club is comprised of Betas vintage to that makes me apart of that mystic shrine on high standup and be counted brothers of the class of Tox what is all this crap about Hershey bars Drow dead animals parts no way The last time Good Wood Berry was seen he was still trying to learn how to run the guard release deep down Central Expressway That was in and he is still running You guys know that if it were not for all of us crazy bastards in the class of everyone of you would be model citizenstea totaliersand very boring introverts We brought out the best in all of you Now back to Brother Justin once a Beta always a Beta If you can stand us you can stand anythingsing to thee Beta Theta Pi Seriously Justins role number is I dont remember who number is I hope not was but this poor bastard should be our Distinguished Beta mother of men Im feeling a song here somewhere Anybody have a loving cup around Homecoming should be a blast Have a great time Hail to the Beta Theta Pi What a catchy tune God I love that song Memories Yours in kai Phil Morrow aka Tuba Join million Eudora users by signing up for a free Eudora WebMail account at At
